text: ByteDance Ltd. () is a Chinese Internet technology company headquartered in Beijing which owns Toutiao and TikTok. It was founded by Zhang Yiming in 2012 and the shared ownership given to its employees. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2012 establishments in China Category:Companies based in Beijing Category:Technology companies of the People's Republic of China Category:Chinese social networking websites
title: ByteDance
